column4: Hmm. Well, unfortunately I haven't been able to see first hand, as even after installing the latest K/Ubuntu release, my wireless isn't able to access the internet. It can see a wireless network or two, but can't seem to connect.
That may be, however, with previous versions I was still unable to connect. Prior to installing the new release, I could get "connected", but I still couldn't access anything.
I cannot access the internet with ubuntu using my LinkSys WUSB100 "Pen Drive" Wireless Adapter
